requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 Or Above (Windows 7 Works But Is Not Supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, Or AMD FX 6300
  • Memory: 4092 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required For Sound
  • Additional Notes: The Game Can Become CPU Heavy At High Waves Due To Enemy Density
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5, Or AMD A10
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Or Equivalent
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required For Sound
  • Additional Notes: SSD
